logo.website: A Music Education Website dedicated to parents and kids who want to learn together music through fun games and songs.
logo.together: You will find videos, activities, games ideas and more! Let’s enjoy music together!

about.1: Hello! Thank you for visiting our page.
about.2: My name is Rumi and I’m a Music and Piano Teacher. I decided to start this series of videos and posts to share with everybody my love for music and share what I have learned through my teaching experience.
about.3: I decided to combine all the things that I love: drawing, making music and teaching and that's how Green Cat Piano was born.
about.4: My goal is to make everybody enjoy the beautiful and fun journey of learning music and give you these tools for the rest of your and your kids life.
about.5: Is dedicated to parents and kids essentially but also to anyone who enjoys games and having fun with music, there is no limit age for learning.
